structure.unit: Chapter 19 RESPONSIBLE PROPERTY OWNER AND MERCHANT ACT

law.catch_line: Assistance of Miami-Dade Police Department in enforcement.

text.section:
Sec. 19-4.8. Assistance of Miami-Dade Police Department in enforcement.
If the enforcement officer is unable to successfully remove any property subject to seizure or removal under this Chapter, the enforcement officer or his designated representatives may secure the assistance of the Miami-Dade Police Department to effect the removal of the property.
